sentences.en: Blake held his handkerchief over the mouthpiece to muffle his voice.
sentences.cn: 布莱克把手绢包在话筒上，以使自己的声音听起来模糊不清。
他竭力抑制自己的感情.

sentences.en: He tried to muffle the alarm clock by putting it under his pillow.
sentences.cn: 他把闹钟塞在枕头底下，想减低声音。

sentences.en: I put my hand over my mouth to muffle my words, so only my friend could hear.
sentences.cn: 我把手挡在嘴上,遮住声音, 仅让我的朋友听到.

sentences.en: Make sure you muffle up properly , because it's pretty cold outside.
sentences.cn: 注意穿暖些, 外面相当冷.

sentences.en: Mother made an effort to muffle her emotions.
sentences.cn: 母亲努力控制自己的感情.

sentences.en: Muffle quilt on tightly, distinguish the sound of the window clutter.
sentences.cn: 就紧紧地裹住被子, 半睡半醒中分辨着窗外杂乱的声响.

sentences.en: Muffle up at the back there!
Muffle up there, and give me a chance to say something.
sentences.cn: 那边安静一下, 让我说几句.

sentences.en: My blossom - printed pillow does little to muffle my mother's screams.
sentences.cn: 母亲在尖叫,我用印花枕头捂住耳朵也起不了什么作用.

sentences.en: She knows how to muffle herself up well.
sentences.cn: 她知道怎样把自己围裹妥当.

sentences.en: The falling snow muffled the sound of our footsteps.
sentences.cn: 飘落的雪使我们的脚步声变得低沉。

sentences.en: To introduce the reform of the oil burning heating steel wire muffle.
sentences.cn: 介绍马弗式燃油钢丝加热炉的改造.

sentences.en: You would hear love's faint murmur, but when love shouts you would muffle your ears.
sentences.cn: 你可以听见爱情的低吟, 但当它咆哮时,你的耳中便一片模糊.

words.tran_cn: 围巾；消音器；面纱；厚手套
使（声音）低沉（muffle的过去式）；压抑（感情等）；裹住；蒙住…的头；捂住…的嘴
低沉的声音；消声器；包裹物（如头巾，围巾等）；唇鼻部

trans.tran_cn: 低沉的声音；消声器；包裹物（如头巾，围巾等）；唇鼻部
包, 蒙住, 压抑(声音)
trans.tran_en: to cover yourself or another person with something thick and warm

trans.tran_cn: 用厚厚的衣帽包着（自己）
裹住，围住，捂住，压抑，阻止，消音
